timeline.bodyText: It might be nice to have a sanity check here that offset is non-negative, since that would indicate we've unexpectedly received a sentinel value. I thought we did that already, but it's obviously not here.
timeline.author: vvcephei

replies.bodyText: We put the check for negative offsets in the RecordCollector, but I guess it doesn't hurt to check again here?
replies.author: ableegoldman

replies.bodyText: Aha! Thanks. Yeah, I'd be in favor of coding defensively here as well.
replies.author: vvcephei
